name: Sea War - Shooting Ship
description:
Sea War - Shooting Ship is firt person shooting game. This game contain different missions,multiple levels and multiple attractive environments. Each mission is different from other. Accept this challege and prove your skills You have

How to play:
- Fire button is on the right bottom corner of the screen.
- Zoom button for focus
- Gun change button is the beside of the fire button

Features:
- Fps
- Island environment
- city environment
- multi guns
- multi levels
- Good graphics
- Easy to play
